summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to AT&T, commanding the company to appear and produce phone records for specific numbers from 2000-2005 for the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)) for which the subpoena is issued.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Subpoena Appearance Date
events.description: AT&T is commanded to appear before the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York to testify and produce phone records.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
11760 US Highway 1, Suite 300 North Palm Beach, FL 33408 (AT&T Global Legal Demands Center address)
keyFacts: The subpoena commands AT&T to produce phone records for specific numbers from the period 2000-2005.
The records are sought for the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
Failure to comply constitutes contempt of court and subjects AT&T to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The subpoena was issued by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss on July 28, 2021, for an appearance on November 29, 2021.
